definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanisms of ultraviolet blood irradiation and oxygenation (UBIO) for psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外線照射充氧自血回輸治療銀屑病的機制。

sentences.english: It can operate flexible to reach the exchange between the oxygenating and stirring.
sentences.chinese: 表曝機運行靈活，可以實現充氧和攪拌的互換。

sentences.english: It enhances oxygenation of tissues while supporting white blood cell activity.
sentences.chinese: 乳鐵蛋白支持白血球活動時，能夠增強組織充氧功能。

sentences.english: During the wort oxygenation a certain amount of air is blown into the wort.
sentences.chinese: 在麥汁充氧過程中，一定量的無菌空氣被充入麥汁中。

sentences.english: Blood is aerated with oxygen in the lungs.
Objective To study the mechanisms of ultraviolet blood irradiation and oxygenation for psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外線照射充氧自血回輸治療銀屑病的機制。

sentences.english: The oxygen transfer performance and construction of perforated membrane tube diffuser have been presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了套袖式微孔曝氣器的充氧性能及研製過程。

sentences.english: It enhances oxygenation of tissues while supporting white blood cell activity. Lactoferrin also acts as an antioxidant to prevent free radical formation.
sentences.chinese: 乳鐵蛋白支持白血球活動時，能夠增強組織充氧功能。
